Hi, how do I burn this on a CD? Can someone please guide me?

@rms8
Google 'astroburn free' download it, install it, run it.  Once the program opens click on the image tab, on the top portion you should see a button to the right of a long textbox, click on it and find the .iso file that you downloaded from here.  Be sure you have a blank disk in your drive and then click accept to burn the .iso to your blank disk.  an .iso file is a virtual image of the disk, so basically you're making a physical copy of your virtual disk into a physical disk.  Hope this helps, also try searching online to help you in the future, google is your friend :-)
